name: Cold Processed Soap
description:
Big Sur - salty forest air of lime and fir
Detox - For a deep cleanse that draws impurities from the body through your pores with activated charcoal and antimicrobial essential oils.
Lavender- A calming blend of rich botanical oils, lavender buds and essential oil.
Moonshadow- An out of earth blend of essential oils and clays for a detoxifying and fresh clean.
Pink Grapefruit- A mineral rich infusion of Himalayan Pink salt, Rose Clay, and uplifting Grapefruit essential oil.
Blood Orange and Rose- a citrus lather with cleansing and nourishing rose clay and rose petal topper.
Sea- A fresh, salty-air soap with mineral rich sea salt and the breezy scent of lavender and lime.
Earth- bergamot, patchouli, mint, and orange essential oils with cleansing rhassoul clay
              
                  Share

name: Expedition: Bath fizzy set
description:
Even Keel Apothecary and Soap House
All-natural bath fizzies that provide 6 sessions of aromatherapeutic baths with essential oil blends. Colored naturally with clay and infused with virgin shea butter to nourish your skin while you soak. 
Namib: Lemongrass, Sweet Orange, PeppermintCappa: Lavender, Cedarwood, FrankincenseSapa: Pine, Peppermine, CedarwoodPetra: Clove bud, Patchouli, Persian LimeUyuni: Rosemary, Eucalyptus, PeppermintJaipur: Cinnamon, Clove bud, Sweet Orange
              
                  Share

name: Bath Soak Test Tube - Nectar Republic
description:
Indulge yourself in a glorious spa treatment in the privacy of your home. Simply add to a warm bath and soak in self-care.
( 2 oz. / 28.35 g.)
Rose Sandalwood - european sea salt, dead sea salt, dendritic salt, kaolin clay, rosa canina (red rose petals), fragrance, rosa damascena (rose) essential oil
Milk + Honey - baking soda, dead sea salt, goat milk, lactose, honey crystals, oats, fragrance
Wildflowers - european sea salt, dendritic salt, rosa canina (pink rose petals), jasminum officinale (jasmine), centaurea cyanus (cornflower), phthalate-free fragrance
Grapefruit lemongrass- european sea salt, dendritic salt, calendula officinalis (marigold), dried lemongrass, hibiscus sabdariffa, fragrance, pink grapefruit rind, citrus paradisi (pink grapefruit) essential oil, cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass) essential oil
              
                  Share

name: Bath Salts - Nectar Republic
description:
Indulge yourself in a glorious spa treatment in the privacy of your home. Simply add to a warm bath and soak in self-care.
( 16 oz. / 435 g.)
Peppermint Tea Tree - dead sea salts, mentha spicata (spearmint) leaf, eucalyptus globulus leaf, mentha piperita (peppermint) leaf & essential oil, melaleuca cajeputi essential oil, melanleuca alternifolia (tea tree) essential oil, activated charcoal
Rose Sandalwood - european sea salt, dead sea salt, dendritic salt, kaolin clay, rosa canina (red rose petals), fragrance, rosa damascena (rose) essential oil
Grapefruit Lemongrass - european sea salt, dendritic salt, calendula officinalis (marigold), dried lemongrass, hibiscus sabdariffa, fragrance, pink grapefruit rind, citrus paradisi (pink grapefruit) essential oil, cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass) essential oil
Lavender Chamomile - european sea salt, dendritic salt, lavandula x intermedia (lavender), matricaria recutita (chamomile), fragrance, lavendula officinalis hybrida (lavender) essential oil
Milk + Honey - baking soda, dead sea salt, goat milk, lactose, honey crystals, oats, fragrance

name: The Entomologist, Heretic Parfum
description:
Keep pests away this summer with this sublime yet functional fragrance. The Entomologist is an EPA-Compliant, 100% natural insect repellent made to protect the bravest and most curious of explorers, naturally. 
SCENT NOTES: Cedar, Geranium, Thyme, Rosemary, Lemongrass, Peppermint, Cinnamon, Clove
